Notes: A group of decorative seaweed that can appear in many different shapes. The seaweed attach to the nearest collision below them. If no collision is available, the individual plant may be placed at the origin of the galaxy.

Obj_arg0.Name: Number of Seaweed
Obj_arg0.Description: The number of seaweed to be placed. Default is 16.

Obj_arg1.Name: Placement Range
Obj_arg1.Description: The range in which the seaweed will be placed. Default is 500.

Obj_arg3.Name: Texture Frame
Obj_arg3.Description: The texture frame to be used. Default corresponds to setting it to 0.
